definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 mpl. [[נְגׁאֲלוּ]] Is 59:3, La 4:14, on form v. Ges:§ 51, 2, Kö:i. 265; Pt. [[נִגְאָלָה]] Zep 3:1; —be defiled, hands with blood [[בַּדָּם]], Is 59:3 cf. La 4:14; pt. as subst. defiled, polluted one Zep 3:1 of Jerusalem (‖[[מֽׂרְאָה]]; appos. [[הָעִיר הַיּוֹנׇה]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 pl. sf. [[גֵּאַלְנוּךָ]] Mal 1:7 pollute, desecrate, obj. ´[[י]] (desecrated in his altar).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיְגׁאֲלוּ מִן־הַכְּהֻנׇּה]] Ezr 2:62 = Ne 7:64 cstr. pregn. and they were desecrated out of the priesthood, i.e. deposed, as desecrated one; Pt. [[מְגׁאָל]] of bread laid on Yahweh's altar Mal 1:7; of Yahweh's altar (table, [[שֻׁלְחָן]]) v:Mal 1:12.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 1 s. [[אֶגְאָָלְתִּי]] Is 63:3 (on Aram. form v. Kö:i. 27 Ges:§ 53 R. 6 but) rd. perh. [[גֵּאָָלְתִּי]] Pi., v. GFM:ThLZ 1887, 292 cf. also Ges:l.c. N. Ol:§ 255 b Sta:§ 159 b, 3; —I have polluted, i.e. stained all my raiment.
